entities.name: pain
entities.description: The protagonist is experiencing intense physical pain, which he finds puzzling since he believes himself to be dead.

entities.name: body
entities.description: The protagonist's body is mentioned as being ripped from him, suggesting that his physical form has been separated from his consciousness.

entities.name: head
entities.description: The protagonist's head hurts badly, which he finds contradictory to the idea of being dead.

entities.name: children
entities.description: Two children are dressed as pumpkins and waddling across the square.

entities.name: shop window
entities.description: The shop window is covered in paper spiders.

entities.name: Muggle
entities.description: The Muggle world is described as being full of 'tawdry' and 'unbelievable' things.

entities.name: trapping
entities.description: The Muggle world is full of 'tawdry' and 'unbelievable' things.

relationships.description: The protagonist's pain is associated with his body, which he believes has been ripped from him.
The protagonist's head experiences the pain.
